name: In app purchases icon
description: Massive collection of hand drawn in app purchase icons for creating attractive and enticing in app purchase store fronts and shops. The pack includes chests, bags,sacks and crates filled with either gold or diamonds. I'm also available for custom modifications if you have a different in game monetization icon , such as a power icon, a different colored gem or crystal and would like to see the chests full of your own icon. Please contact me through any channel to arrange a modification request
